thread.section_title: iTailor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iTailor | itailor.com
thread.title: J William Donohoe
thread.title_full: iTailor reviewed by J William Donohoe

author: J William Donohoe
title: J William Donohoe
text: Have had many custom suits by traveling made to measure suit companies. Decided to try my hand at self measure. Tried three different companies. iTailor got it spot on for the three suits I ordered. Best fit I have ever had. Good wool blend fabrics (not 100% wool but which gives a good luster instead). Outstanding shirt fabrics. Had a discrepancy on a shirt order and they made me an offer of correction that was above and beyond. Really good price for their fabrics of the week. I HIGHLY recommend this company for your made to measure suits. Will be placing more orders
